data.actual_result: You can't drag Discord around while it's on the loading screen
data.expected_result: You should be able to drag Discord around
data.short_description: You can't drag the main discord screen around when it's on the loading screen [macOS only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Reload the client by pressing CMD + R - Wait until you see the spinning logo - Attempt to drag the window around
